title: Times Square May Get One of the Few Spectacles It Lacks: A Casino
description: The battle to win a New York City casino license has heated up in Manhattan, with real estate and gambling giants offering competing proposals for Times Square and Hudson Yards.
dc:creator: Dana Rubinstein, Nicole Hong and Michael Paulson
media:credit: Christopher Lee for The New York Times
media:description: The new proposal for a Times Square casino already faces opposition from the Broadway League, a trade association representing theater owners and producers.
